casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Lawrence, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Lawrence (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 1207.]

(No. 97-2585 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Maureen O’Connor, Summit County Prosecuting Attorney, and Paul Michael Marie, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. James L. Burdon and John T. Martin, for appellant.

The appeal is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
